pages.text: The $(4)Totem of Blood Shielding$() is a loyal guardian. Unlike traditional totems, it does not need to be held in your hand to function.
As long as it remains in your $(n)inventory$(), it will sacrifice itself to save you from certain death. However, once triggered, it becomes $(8)depleted$().
A depleted totem can be $(c)recharged$() at a Blood Altar. By bathing it in fresh essence, you can restore its protective power and prepare it for the next fatal strike.
